pullRequest.title: Mapped parts of ScreenHandler
pullRequest.bodyText:
I have mapped a couple of methods in ScreenHandler and added names for a few variables. It's my first time contributing so would like to know if there is anything I should change.
method_30010 -> removeStack
Renamed a few auto-generated names in the methods in ScreenHandler
Mapped getStack()
Mapped totalSlots()

commit.message:
Mapped some methods in ScreenHandler

- Mapped method_30010 as removeStack
- Mapped some variable related to these methods
- A few more mappings in ScreenHandler

nodes.bodyText: what does Num mean here? Is it the slot id or the slot count?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,9 +51,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1703 net/minecraft/screen/ScreenHandler
 	METHOD method_7593 onSlotClick (IILnet/minecraft/class_1713;Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;
 		COMMENT Performs a slot click. This can behave in many different ways depending mainly on the action type.
 		COMMENT @return The stack that was clicked on before anything changed, used mostly for verifying that the client and server are in sync
+		ARG 1 slotNum

@@ -33,8 +33,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1703 net/minecraft/screen/ScreenHandler
 		ARG 0 context
 		ARG 1 player
 		ARG 2 block
-	METHOD method_30010 (IILnet/minecraft/class_1713;Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;
+	METHOD method_30010 removeStack (IILnet/minecraft/class_1713;Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;
+		ARG 1 stackNum

nodes.bodyText: No. This is an override of a List method, and the name should not be touched. (There's also nothing about this class that's specific to slots.)
Same here, this is from List.
And this one is from Collection.

commit.message:
Complete requested changes from PR review

- Changed back unrelated methods
- Fixed an area of ambiguity in onSlotClick

nodes.bodyText: Hmm, is this the slot ID (Slot.id) or its index in ScreenHandler.slots?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,9 +51,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1703 net/minecraft/screen/ScreenHandler
 	METHOD method_7593 onSlotClick (IILnet/minecraft/class_1713;Lnet/minecraft/class_1657;)Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;
 		COMMENT Performs a slot click. This can behave in many different ways depending mainly on the action type.
 		COMMENT @return The stack that was clicked on before anything changed, used mostly for verifying that the client and server are in sync
+		ARG 1 slotid

commit.message:
Changed slotid to slotIndex

Fixing issue raised by Juuxel
